name: Al Cohn
description: '''Alvin Gilbert Cohn''' (November 24, 1925 â€“ February 15, 1988) was an American [[jazz]] [[saxophonist]], [[musical arrangement|arranger]] and [[composer]]. He came to prominence in the band of clarinetist [[Woody Herman]] and was known for his longtime musical partnership with fellow saxophonist [[Zoot Sims]].
